message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you for $95. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm sure you'll get a lot of use out of it.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I believe I can find something similar within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $85 for the product.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm confident in the value of this product. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'd like to keep moving towards a mutually beneficial agreement. My counteroffer would be $87 for the product.
